subject: Attention: Rightful Benefici
body:
Attention: Rightful Beneficiary, sir
On behalf of the The Debt Management Office (DMO) Nigeria, the central
bank as the Apex  Nigeria hereby apologizes for the delay
in the payment of your Funds today
(1)Contract/Inheritance Payment Decree 12 which stipulated that every
Contractor must be paid a  Foreign Contractor.
I promised as your payment has been approved.,in the next 42hrs your
money will be confirmed with your bank.
$17.5m
A copy of your ID
Your account info
Your phone number.
Nigeria's debt sustainability now threatened, says DMO The Nation Newspaper
Ms.Patience Oniha

subject: Re:   Attention: Rightful Benefici
body:
Hello Oniha,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the update regarding the payment delay from The Debt Management Office DMO Nigeria and the Central Bank. It's good to know that my payment is being taken care of.

Could you please provide more details about this Contract Payment Decree? I'm not quite familiar with it, so any additional information would be helpful.

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "your payment has been the next your money will be confirmed with your bank"? I'm a bit confused about this part.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Stephanie
